mapper.insert: insert into ANSWER_COUNT ( member_num, count, question_num ) values ( #{member_num}, 1, #{question_num});
mapper.select: select count from ANSWER_COUNT where question_num= #{question_num} and member_num= #{member_num}
select * from ANSWER where question_num= #{question_num} and member_num= #{member_num} and answer_delete = "N" order by answer_num DESC
select answer_num, answer, public_answer from ANSWER where answer_num= #{answer_num}
select answer from ANSWER where public_answer= "Y" and question_num=#{question_num} order by RAND() limit 8
mapper.update: UPDATE ANSWER_COUNT SET count=count+1 WHERE question_num= #{question_num} and member_num= #{member_num};
UPDATE ANSWER_COUNT SET count=count-1 WHERE question_num= #{question_num} and member_num= #{member_num};
mapper.select: SELECT q.question, a.answer_num, a.answer_year, a.answer_date, a.answer, a.question_num, a.member_num, a.delete_date, a.answer_delete FROM ANSWER a, QUESTION q WHERE a.question_num = q.question_num and a.answer_delete = "Y" and member_num= #{member_num} ORDER BY question_num DESC, answer_num DESC;
